name: Mustache or Revenge
description:
Our Hero finds himself in dangerous dungeon welcoming him with a threat – fiend who wants to steal his mustaches. To save his pride our Hero needs to pass through dangerous traps and not get fooled by “Stealer of Mustaches”.

- Do not let fiend steal your mustaches!
- Feel classic traps in a new way, their finesse might surprise you!
- Do you need to trust tips signs give you?
- Atmosphere of a dangerous dungeon.
- Driving retro soundtrack.
- Magical amulet wouldn’t let you rest in peace.
- Conversations between hero and villain.
